# visionone_crm_group (Resource)

Manages a Cloud Risk Management Group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "visionone_crm_group" "example_group" {
  name = "Production Group"
  tags = ["prod", "critical"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the group.

### Optional

- `tags` (Set of String) Tags associated with the group.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique ID of the group.

## Import
```shell
terraform import visionone_crm_group.example_group ${group_id}
```
